attributes.action: Id card with Live voting system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since Goverment will win the ID card battle - it would only be fair to provide an online - live voting E ID card..
Where all souls who own an ID card can choose wether their happy/unhappy with their current Regime/Government -
If more than 70% feel unhappy for a general election to automatically be called - no more of this 4 years of power..

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
